main_definition: Classes can refer to different concepts, including groupings of students in an educational setting, categories or types within a system, and programming language object-oriented structures.

meanings_and_examples.example: The math classes are scheduled for Monday and Wednesday afternoons.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Categories or types within a system
meanings_and_examples.example: There are several classes in the library: fiction, non-fiction, science, and history.
In object-oriented programming, a class defines the properties and behaviors that objects of that class will have.
